name: Night Walker
description:
The Night Walker is a horror VR game about the horrors of walking home alone at night.  Using your limited phone battery, you must safely navigate your way through the dimly lit streets. You appear to be alone, but are you really?

Requirements
  • Oculus Rift Headset
  • Oculus Touch Controllers
Controls
  • Left Thumbstick: Turn Body
  • Right Thumbstick: Move Body
  • A Button: Toggle Flashlight
  • B Button: Toggle Map
Team 

Lead Game Designer: Jared Long

  • Student of California State Monterey Bay working on a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and an Associate's Degree in Communication Design with emphasis on Game Development and Game Design. 

Game Designer: Brian Hogue

  • Student of California State Monterey Bay working on a Bachelor's Degree in Communication Design

Game Developer: Antonin Chantier

  • Student of California State Monterey Bay working on a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science

Game Developer: Pierre Verhaeghe

  • Student of California State Monterey Bay working on a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
Installation Instructions

Download the zip file and extract the folder. Run "Night Walker Build V4".exe from the folder. Enjoy!
